Kayla Becker was born on 7 June 1991 in Wadley, Alabama, USA. She is an actress, known for WWE NXT (2010), Stranglehold and WWE Smackdown! (1999).
Kayla Becker is a storyteller, broadcaster and survivor. At the age ... From 2016 to 2024, Kayla thrived as a lead broadcaster for WWE.
